title: Android app download ranges worldwide 2018
summary: This is a bar chart representing Number of downloads in the x axis and Share of apps in the y axis.
The Share of apps is appeared to be the highest at Number of downloads 100-500 and lowest at Number of downloads 5000000+.
The Share of apps of Number of downloads 5000000+ is 211.2% smaller than the maximum value at 100-500.
